original_text:
When their judges are thrown over the cliff,
    then they shall hear my words, for they are pleasant.
korean_text: 그들의 재판관들이 바위 곁에 내려 던져졌도다 내 말이 달므로 무리가 들으리로다

sentences.original_text: When their judges are thrown over the cliff,
then they shall hear my words,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 말을 듣게 될 것이요,
